DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the use of a single blood sample of 1cc in an aerobic bottle will provide a better yield and time to positivity than 2 samples of 0.5 cc in 2 (aerobic and anaerobic) bottles for blood cultures in neonates.
DOC.brief_title: Increasing the Yield of Blood Cultures in Neonates
DOC.criteria: All blood cultures taken in the NICU during the study period. Bacteria that are normal flora of the skin such as Coagulase negative staphylococci or Streptococci Viridans are considered, except if grown in two sets of cultures or in the presence of laboratory and clinical indices of infection.
